EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_Lean Startup Conference_Q415.Pre-event email
EmailTemplate.subject: Join Pivotal at Lean Startup in San Francisco
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Pivotal has a lot going on this year as a sponsor, presenter and exhibitor at The Lean Startup Conference <http://leanstartup.co/conferences/lean-startup-conference-2015/> – November 16th - 19th in San Francisco. If you haven’t registered yet, use Pivotal 20 <https://events.bizzabo.com/leanstartup2015?promo=Pivotal20> to get a 20% discount on the current published price.
Pivotal is transforming how the world builds software. To learn more about our combination of leading agile development services, lean methodologies, open cloud platform and open suite of big data products, be sure to visit us in the exhibit hall!
Janice Fraser, Director of Transformation and Innovation at Pivotal, will give the Lean Startup Leader’s Guide Workshop <http://leanstartup.co/conferences/lean-startup-conference-2015/program-details/?day=ALL#session1790> on Monday, November 16th. Lauren Gilchrist, Product Manager for Pivotal Labs, will co-present with our customer the Internal Revenue Service a session entitled Minimum Viable Taxes: Lessons learned building an MVP inside the IRS <http://leanstartup.co/conferences/lean-startup-conference-2015/program-details/?day=ALL#session1800> on Tuesday, November 17th.
We look forward to seeing you in San Francisco!
The Pivotal Team
